sentences.en: At present are 2 - chloro ben - mode of destructible cover stealthily.
sentences.cn: 目前主要有2种形式可破坏显偷换盖.

sentences.en: Cabbages, caraways, radishes , all emerged stealthily , afraid of lagging behind.
sentences.cn: 先是小白菜 、 香菜、水萝卜, 争相悄然而出.

sentences.en: Fagin stealthily descended the kitchen stairs.
sentences.cn: 费根蹑手蹑足下扶梯到厨房去.

sentences.en: Faraway or nearby, he wants to guard her smile - Stealthily, secretly, deeply and all the time.
sentences.cn: 他不管和她是远是近, 他都想守护着她的笑容 —— 偷偷地, 暗暗地, 深深地,一直一直地.

sentences.en: He crept stealthily along the corridor.
sentences.cn: 他沿着走廊蹑手蹑脚地走.

sentences.en: I heard my landlady creeping stealthily up to my door.
sentences.cn: 我听到我的女房东偷偷地来到我的门前.

sentences.en: On it came - on, silently and stealthily, to the bed's head.
sentences.cn: 它走上前来, 无声无息偷偷摸摸地摸到了床头.

sentences.en: She went stealthily as a cat through this profusion of growth.
sentences.cn: 她从这一片繁茂丛杂的幽花野草中间,象一只猫似的,轻轻悄悄地走了过去.

sentences.en: She went stealthily, mopping her flushed , stained cheeks, frightened, angry, very miserable.
sentences.cn: 她悄悄走着, 一面揩着火烫的 、 泪渍的脸, 又怕, 又气, 非常难受.

sentences.en: Slowly and stealthily, someone was creeping up the stairs.
sentences.cn: 有人正蹑手蹑脚地上楼。

sentences.en: So they went tiptoeing stealthily down, the one behind the other.
sentences.cn: 于是,他俩一前一后,踮着脚尖, 偷偷走过去.

sentences.en: Stealthily we approached the enemy's camp.
sentences.cn: 我们偷偷地摸向敌人的营地.

sentences.en: The fist sunlight go through the window blind stealthily.
sentences.cn: 晨光悄悄地穿过百叶窗.

sentences.en: The thief stealthily stole into the house.
sentences.cn: 那个贼悄悄地潜入房子.

sentences.en: They peeped out stealthily from a corner of the wall.
sentences.cn: 他们几个在墙角处鬼头鬼脑地往外探望.

words.tran_cn: 剽窃；偷偷地做；偷窃；vi. 窃取；偷偷地行动；偷垒；n. 偷窃；便宜货；偷垒；断球
